item.title: Asymptotic equivalence of the Harrell-Davis median estimator and the sample median
item.description: Carl N Yoshizawa, Pranab K Sen, C Edward Davis “Asymptotic equivalence of the Harrell-Davis median estimator and the sample median” (1985) // Communications in Statistics-Theory and Methods.
